messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Uoi April Platform Sierra. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Uoi April Platform Sierra's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Uoi April Platform Sierra, please stand-by.
